thread.title: Ada priest joins leadership at Holy Spirit Episcopal Church in Belmont - MLive.com
thread.title_full: Ada priest joins leadership at Holy Spirit Episcopal Church in Belmont - MLive.com

title: Ada priest joins leadership at Holy Spirit Episcopal Church in Belmont - MLive.com
text:
Rev. Nurya Love Parish is joining the leadership at Holy Spirit Episcopal Church in Belmont. Supplied 
There is a new priest helping lead Holy Spirit Episcopal Church in Belmont. 
Rev. Nurya Love Parish, an Ada resident, has joined the church as the part-time priest-in-charge. 
Parish has been in the ministry for 20 years. She graduated from Harvard Divinity School and was ordained as a Christian pastor in the Unitarian Universalist Association, serving at Fountain Street Church in downtown Grand Rapids. 
She left her prior denomination to join the Episcopal Church, becoming ordained in the priesthood in 2011. 
From 2011 to 2016, Parish served as the associate priest at St. Andrew's Episcopal Church in Grand Rapids. 
She currently is the co-founder of Plainsong Farm, a Rockford-based farm and ministry. The farm finished its first growing season last year. 
The farm also operates the ministry Grow Christians, www.growchristians.org , a website that aims to encourage families in their faith. 
Holy Spirit Episcopal Church holds Sunday worship services at 10 a.m. The church is located at 1200 Post Drive NE. More News
